text: Thank you for calling technical support. My name is Michael. How can I help you today?
Hi Michael, I'm having trouble connecting my new smart home device to my Wi-Fi network.
I understand how frustrating that can be. I'd be happy to help you get that connected. What type of smart home device are you trying to set up?
It's a smart thermostat. The brand is HomeComfort.

Thanks for that information. I'm familiar with the HomeComfort thermostats. First, let's make sure your phone is connected to the same Wi-Fi network that you want to connect the thermostat to. Is that the case?
Yes, my phone is connected to my home Wi-Fi network.
Perfect. Now, have you downloaded the HomeComfort app from the app store?
Yes, I have the app installed, but when I try to add the device, it keeps saying 'Device not found'.

I see. Let's troubleshoot that. First, let's make sure the thermostat is in pairing mode. On the thermostat, press and hold the power button for 5 seconds until you see the Wi-Fi icon blinking. Do you see that blinking icon?
Let me try that... Yes, now I see the Wi-Fi icon is blinking.
Great! Now, go back to the app, tap 'Add Device' and then select 'Thermostat' from the list of devices. Then tap 'Next' and the app should start scanning for your device.
Okay, I'm doing that now... Hey, it found the device! It's asking me to select my Wi-Fi network.
Excellent! Select your Wi-Fi network and enter your Wi-Fi password when prompted. The thermostat should connect within a minute or two.
It's connecting... and it's done! The thermostat is now showing up in my app. Thank you so much for your help!
You're very welcome! I'm glad we were able to get your thermostat connected. Is there anything else you'd like help with today?
No, that's all I needed. Thanks again for your assistance.
It was my pleasure helping you today. If you have any other questions or issues in the future, please don't hesitate to call us back. Have a wonderful day!
